reviewText: My husband enjoys all things trains, including this video.
This is a great DVD, it has a many different types of locomotives from all different railroads for the steam fan to enjoy!!!!

I wish they had spent more time telling us what kind of locomotive we were watching.  Quite often I found myself trying to spot wheel alignment to try to figure it out but the photos rarely gave you a side shot to help with the identification.  Still, if you love steam locomotives you will want this in your collection.
